column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=On Friday , I decided to go grocery shopping .
#text=My mother made a list of all the items we needed and I went to go buy them .
#text=While I was at the grocery store , I looked for everything on the list .
#text=Some of them were hard to find , so I had to ask a worker where to find them .
#text=They were very helpful and pointed where to go .
#text=Some of the items were not available so I had to get a raincheck .
#text=After I got all the available items , I had to stand on line at the checkout .
#text=The line was very long and there were no other checkout lines open .
#text=It was frustrating because I did not have that much items to buy .
#text=Meanwhile , there were at least four people ahead of me with a lot of items to buy .
#text=Fortunately , one person ahead of me was kind enough to let me skip him .
#text=Finally , I left the grocery store with my items .
